short_summary: Delivery of Sand and Salt mixtures
description: Supply, delivery, and off-loading of Sand and Salt mixtures
full_summary:
=====================================================

**Tender Notice**
---------------

### Invitation to Bid: W0127-23P007

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Canadian businesses to submit bids for the supply, delivery, and off-loading of sand and salt mixtures for the Department of National Defence (DND) at the Edmonton Garrison, in Edmonton, Alberta.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Number:** W0127-23P007
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Contract Start Date:** November 15, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** October 1, 2026
* **Bid Submission Deadline:** Modified from October 12, 2023, to October 24, 2023, at 14:00 EDT

### Contract Specifications

The tender involves the supply, delivery, and off-loading of sand and salt mixtures to the Department of National Defence at the Edmonton Garrison. All bids must include the required supporting documentation and be submitted via the Ariba Discovery platform by the revised deadline.

### Inquiring Parties

* **Department of National Defence (DND)**
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact:**
	+ Melanie Perrin, PSPC/SPAC
	+ Email: [melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: Not provided
